column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I've never had tapas before so this was my first experience.... I. WAS. FLOORED. Every single dish we had was perfect. We had the garlic shrimp
column5: and fried chicken with piri-piri sauce! All of them were delicious. We also tried the paella-mixta which was also very good and enough for the 4 of us after all the tapas! We also split the sangria! The passion fruit sangria was my favorite & will be yours too if you like sweeter sangria! A great waiter & a great environment played another amazing part of this excellent experience! I will definitely be returning!
